pages.text: Phosphorus lamps are obtained from gems with the Designer ability by giving them a redstone lamp and a piece of selenite. These blocks can be powered by redstone to illuminate an area.

Colored phosphorus lamps are obtained from gems with the Designer ability by giving them an uncolored phosphorus lamp and a piece of Chroma in your choice of color.$(br2)These blocks can be powered by redstone to illuminate an area.
